name: Paracetamol 500mg
usage: Used to reduce fever and relieve mild to moderate pain.

name: Amoxicillin 250mg
usage: Treats a wide variety of bacterial infections.

name: Cetirizine 10mg
usage: Used for allergies, hay fever, and hives.

name: Metformin 500mg
usage: Used to control high blood sugar in type 2 diabetes.

name: Pantoprazole 40mg
usage: Used for acid reflux and ulcers.
